title: Pizza price hike causes increased D for hamburgers

content.question: Which of the following events will cause the demand curve for hamburgers to shift to the right?

choices.label: An increase in the price of pizza, a substitute for hamburgers
An increase in the price of a french fries, a complement to hamburgers
An increase in the price of hamburgers
A decrease in the price of hamburgers
A decrease in the cost of producing hamburgers

content.answer: An increase in the price of pizza, a substitute for hamburgers

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
